oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de Visite of Private Zebulon Nixon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A Carte de visite showing Private Zeublon Nixon (seated) & Ben (standing.) Zebulon Nixon served in Cos. A and F of the 36th Ohio Volunteer Infantry. The identification of the second man was speculated upon as being Ben Grubb. Both men appear in Union army issued sack coats. Both men also wear cravats around their necks and appear to be wearing U.S. issued trousers. The Carte de visite was created by T.M. Schleier's Photograph Gallery in Nashville.
